record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1911. Sixth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fifth row: W. P. Steffen (assistant coach), H. E. Goettler, C. P. Freeman, and N. B. Johnson (trainer); fourth row: J. B. Canning, H. F. Scruby, N. H. Norgren, and I. N. Davenport; third row: H. L. Harris, W. L. Kennedy, S. R. Pierce, and S. Sellers; second row: J. B. Lawler, R. V. Fonger, C. M. Rademacher (captain), W. W. Goddard, and N. C. Paine; first row: L. H. Whiting, C. G. Sauer, W. S. Kassulker, and H. M. Carpenter.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on heavy, stiff, photo album paper. Attached caption.
